about_the_game:
THE JUNGLE CALLS... DO YOU ANSWER?

  • Experience a fluid momentum based movement system. Fulfill the fantasy of ape-ing out at maximum speed.

  • Utilize a wide variety of movement mechanics and parkour moves: Dash, Slide, Dive, Slam or combine them all with the Monkey developed Banan-Bomb technology.

  • Compete with fellow apes, top the scoreboards and become the alpha primate.

  • Operate an epic fecal-fueled arsenal of primal weapons to deliver dopamine straight to your primate dome.

  • Blitz your way through destructible environments and lay waste to Tiki Cults, Cybernetic Armies and Ancient Beings.

  • Enhance your Ape with black market serums and rare artifacts, to create your very own monkey build.

  • Embark on a Chimp crusade to far away lands, including Lush Jungles, Ancient Temples, Neon Cityscapes and bonus Hidden Realms.

  • Make friends with the locals, relax on Ape Island and catch some fish for a nice Monkey supper.

  • Listen to a diverse soundtrack, with synth-wave, bongo beats, rock and more.
detailed_description:
THE JUNGLE CALLS... DO YOU ANSWER?

  • Experience a fluid momentum based movement system. Fulfill the fantasy of ape-ing out at maximum speed.

  • Utilize a wide variety of movement mechanics and parkour moves: Dash, Slide, Dive, Slam or combine them all with the Monkey developed Banan-Bomb technology.

  • Compete with fellow apes, top the scoreboards and become the alpha primate.

  • Operate an epic fecal-fueled arsenal of primal weapons to deliver dopamine straight to your primate dome.

  • Blitz your way through destructible environments and lay waste to Tiki Cults, Cybernetic Armies and Ancient Beings.

  • Enhance your Ape with black market serums and rare artifacts, to create your very own monkey build.

  • Embark on a Chimp crusade to far away lands, including Lush Jungles, Ancient Temples, Neon Cityscapes and bonus Hidden Realms.

  • Make friends with the locals, relax on Ape Island and catch some fish for a nice Monkey supper.

  • Listen to a diverse soundtrack, with synth-wave, bongo beats, rock and more.
name: HYPER PRIMATE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-5010U or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low Settings, 1080p@60fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 or equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Max Settings, 1440p@60fps

short_description: Ape-out, escape containment and blast your way through high octane, retro style levels. Utilize unparalleled movement and unhinged weaponry to conquer Mankind. Top the scoreboards, be the fastest ape, and activate your neurons in this ultra-fast movement FPS.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
